notice.title:
This workflow will run on the schedule you define here once you activate it.

For testing, you can also trigger it manually: by going back to the canvas and clicking 'test workflow'
notice.displayName:
This workflow will run on the schedule you define here once you activate it.

For testing, you can also trigger it manually: by going back to the canvas and clicking 'test workflow'

daysInterval.description: Number of days between each workflow trigger
daysInterval.title: Days Between Triggers

secondsInterval.description: Number of seconds between each workflow trigger
secondsInterval.title: Seconds Between Triggers

monthsInterval.description: Would run every month unless specified otherwise
monthsInterval.title: Months Between Triggers

weeksInterval.description: Would run every week unless specified otherwise
weeksInterval.title: Weeks Between Triggers

triggerAtDayOfMonth.description: The day of the month to trigger (1-31)
triggerAtDayOfMonth.title: Trigger at Day of Month

triggerAtHour.description: The hour of the day to trigger
triggerAtHour.title: Trigger at Hour

hoursInterval.description: Number of hours between each workflow trigger
hoursInterval.title: Hours Between Triggers

triggerAtMinute.description: The minute past the hour to trigger (0-59)
triggerAtMinute.title: Trigger at Minute

notice.title: You can find help generating your cron expression here
notice.displayName: You can find help generating your cron expression here

minutesInterval.description: Number of minutes between each workflow trigger
minutesInterval.title: Minutes Between Triggers

init_kwargs.title: Scade tools: Schedule Trigger
init_kwargs.description: Triggers the workflow on a given schedule
